targets.expr: (sum by (instance, url) (rate(prometheus_remote_storage_samples_bytes_total{$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_key=~"$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_value_regex"}[1m])*60 or rate(prometheus_remote_storage_bytes_total{$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_key=~"$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_value_regex"}[1m])*60) + sum by (instance, url) (rate(prometheus_remote_storage_metadata_bytes_total{$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_key=~"$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_metrics_label_value_regex"}[1m])*60))

sum by (namespace, pod) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{pod=~"$tmpl_var_prometheus_agent_pod_regex", container!=""}[1m])) /
sum by (namespace, pod) (node:node_num_cpu{job=~"node-exporter"})* 100
